comment: [ 1 ] activity_metrics are the metric that I track about any activity I do
scope: categorical metric, 0 is Facebook (Work), 1 is personal, 2 other
[ 2 ] activiry_rules is a map for activity to a baseline score definition
activity are string that are contained in google_myactivity context
